Description:
Model
Brand: Aukey
Name: Overview Full HD Video 1080p Webcam
Model: PC-LM1E
Part Number: 1014662


Details
Color: Black
Interface: USB
Image Sensor: 1/2.9" CMOS image sensor
Effective Pixels: 2.0 M
Video Capture Resolution: 1920 x 1080
Frame Rate: 30 fps
Operating Systems Supported: Compatible with Windows XP, Mac OS 10.6, and Android 5.0 or above.


Features
Features: High-definition 1080p

2-megapixel webcam

1/2.9" CMOS image sensor

Built-in stereo microphones

Sharp And Smooth
Excellent video quality with 1080p streaming and recording at 30fps. Good performance even in dimly lit rooms. Fixed focus keeps things in focus up to five meters away. Stream and capture clearer and more detailed video, also with stereo sound.

Easy Set-Up
No drivers or software to install; just plug this webcam into your device's USB port. Compatible with Windows XP, Mac OS 10.6, and Android 5.0 or above.

Flexible Fit
Fits most flat-screen computer monitors and laptop screens. Simply stand the webcam on your desk. Angle the two clip/stand hinges for the most stable position, with the webcam tilted up or down for the best view.


Package Contents
Package Contents: 1 x AUKEY PC-LM1E 1080p Webcam
1 x User Manual
Label: Webcam AUKEY 1080p
